#Text= Bolin says : " Kuvira must 've done some override thing and taken control !

column1: #Text=" Mako says : " There 's got to be some other way to shut down power from here .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Ummm ... " Mako says : " Come on .
#Text=You spent all that time working with Varrick and Baatar Jr. .
#Text=Did n't any of their genius rub off on you ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Look , the only thing I know about these vines is that if you mess around with them too much , they explode .
#Text=" Mako says : " Get those engineers out of here .
#Text=I have an idea .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Want to fill me in ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm gon na zap these vines with some electricity .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Let 's back it up , okay ?
#Text=I said that will make the vines explode .
#Text=" Mako says : " Exactly .
#Text=This is our only way of shutting this thing down .
#Text=I can handle it .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No !
#Text=You ca n't !
#Text=This is n't the time to prove how awesome you are .
#Text=I already know how awesome you are ... you 're awesome .
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't have time to argue !
#Text=I 'm doing this , so get out of here !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Okay , but for the record , I do not approve .
#Text=Just , get out as soon as you can .
#Text=Promise ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Promise .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I love you .
#Text=" Mako says : " I love you , too .
#Text=Now go !
#Text="
